divs: sighting detailsufo was in the s\e sky above irvine. ca., heading n\w toward tustin, ca. it's path of travel came down at a steep angle, then flatten out and continued n\w. object came to a stop and remained motionless & hovered. i thought it was a helicopter but it made no noise. object continued to emit an extremely bright orange & red light that reflected off the surrounding overcast (not clouds)like a halo. light looked like the color of a burning match. it appeared that the entire object was illuminating not just typical on board light(s). object remained motionless until a small airplane began to cross its area, as commercial aircraft typical fly this route into john wayne airport. as the aircraft got closer to the object it immediately did a slight down turn maneuver shot up at a high rate of speed and appeared to just blink out of sight. total duration of the event was 30 to 40 seconds
